data: PED NEPH AMB Vitamin D Deficiency Management
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
Vitamin D Deficiency Management Algorithm
Medications
Vitamin D 25-Hydroxy: less than 12.5 nmol/L (severe deficiency)
vitamin D3
8,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 4 week, drug form: tab
8,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 4 week, drug form: oral liq
vitamin D3
4,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 8 week, drug form: tab
4,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 8 week, drug form: oral liq
vitamin D3
8,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 30 day, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 30 day
8,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 30 day, drug form: oral liq, dispense qty: 30 day
vitamin D3
4,000 unit, PO, qdaily, 8000 units qdaily for 4 weeks then 4000 units qdaily for 8 weeks, order duration: 60 day, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 60 day
4,000 unit, PO, qdaily, 8000 units qdaily for 4 weeks then 4000 units qdaily for 8 weeks, order duration: 60 day, drug form: oral liq, dispense qty: 60 day
Vitamin D 25-Hydroxy: 12.5 nmol/L to 39 nmol/L (mild deficiency)
vitamin D3
4,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 12 week, drug form: tab
4,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 12 week, drug form: oral liq
vitamin D3
4,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 90 day, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 90 day
4,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 90 day, drug form: oral liq, dispense qty: 90 day
Vitamin D 25-Hydroxy: 39 nmol/L to 74 nmol/L (insufficiency)
vitamin D3
2,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 12 week, drug form: tab
2,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 12 week, drug form: oral liq
vitamin D3
2,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 90 day, drug form: tab, dispense qty: 90 day
2,000 unit, PO, qdaily, order duration: 90 day, drug form: oral liq, dispense qty: 90 day
Vitamin D 25-Hydroxy: 74 nmol/L to 200 nmol/L (optimal)
Continue adequate intake
For less than 12 months of age: 400 to 600 units daily  For greater than or equal to 12 months of age: 600 to 1000 units daily

400 unit, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab
400 unit, PO, qdaily, drug form: oral liq
600 unit, PO, qdaily, drug form: tab
600 unit, PO, qdaily, drug form: oral liq

1,000 unit, PO, qdaily, drug form: oral liq

Laboratory
Vitamin D 25-Hydroxy: less than 74 nmol/L  - Recheck Vitamin D 25-Hydroxy level, Calcium, Phosphate, Alkaline Phosphatase and PTH after 12 weeks
